Inner Balance, Outer Growth

"Because everyone needs a little help sometimes"

Hi, I‚Äôm Shreya Raghuwanshi, a Licensed Clinical Psychologist.

You don‚Äôt need to have answers or explanations to begin.

Sometimes life simply feels heavy or hard to carry alone ‚Äî and that is reason enough to reach out.

ManoArohan is a space to help you make sense of your emotions and find steadiness again, at your own pace.

Who This Space Is For

If life has been feeling a little heavy ‚Äî
even if you can‚Äôt fully explain why ‚Äî
this space is for you.

You don‚Äôt need to be in crisis to seek support, and you don‚Äôt need to arrive with everything clearly defined. Sometimes emotions feel overwhelming, confusing, or simply difficult to carry alone. That, in itself, is reason enough to reach out.

This space may be helpful for you if‚Ä¶

  • You experience persistent anxiety, low mood, stress, or emotional exhaustion
  • You feel stuck in patterns of overthinking, avoidance, or self-doubt
  • You struggle with confidence, emotional regulation, or feeling understood
  • Relationships feel challenging, overwhelming, or unsatisfying
  • You are navigating life transitions, loss, or periods of uncertainty
  • You sense that something isn‚Äôt quite right, even if you can‚Äôt name it yet

Therapy, at your pace

Therapy here is not about rushing to conclusions or fitting you into a box. It is a collaborative process of understanding your experiences - gently and thoughtfully.

If a clinical concern is present, it can be explored ethically and carefully, with the aim of clarity, self-awareness and appropriate care.

‚Äú

Beginning doesn‚Äôt require certainty.

You don‚Äôt need to have all the answers before you begin. We‚Äôll take it one step at a time ‚Äî together.

Services

Comprehensive psychological care tailored to your unique journey.

Individual Therapy

(Adults & Adolescents)

One-to-one sessions focused on understanding your thoughts, emotions, and behaviours. Sessions are collaborative, confidential, and paced according to your comfort.

Family Therapy

Support for families to improve communication, understanding, and emotional connection.

Couple Therapy

Helping couples navigate relationship concerns, strengthen communication, and build healthier dynamics.

Psychological Assessment

& Psychodiagnosis

Evidence-based assessments to aid clinical understanding, diagnosis, and treatment planning when required.

Career Counselling

Structured guidance for academic and career decision-making using validated tools and personalised exploration.

Workshops

Psychoeducational and skill-based workshops on mental health, emotional wellbeing, and coping strategies for groups and institutions.

Sessions available In-Person & Online

Licensed Clinical Psychologist

About Me

Hi, I'm Shreya Raghuwanshi.

With training in evidence-based psychological interventions, I work with diverse populations using a client-centered, non-judgemental, and collaborative approach.

My work integrates clinical expertise with a deep respect for each person‚Äôs lived experience. Therapy at ManoArohan is approached with confidentiality, autonomy, and clinical responsibility.

"While labels are never imposed, assessment and diagnosis are used thoughtfully when they help bring clarity, understanding, and direction to the therapeutic process. Mental health concerns are addressed with both sensitivity and evidence-based care."

Credentials

  • M.Phil. in Clinical Psychology
  • Licensed Clinical Psychologist (RCI Registered)
  • LGBTQIA+ Affirmative Listening & Mental Health Practice
  • Green Belt Certification in Career CounsellingUnivariety with UCLA Extension
  • Training in School Counselling
